Reference

Code chunks

Use these functions to access vegaspecs you create in RMarkdown using the languages vegajson and vegayaml (vegayml).

vegadown() vegadown_labels()

Access vegaspecs

vegawidget

These functions are re-exported from vegawidget.

as_vegaspec

Coerce to vegaspec

vega_schema

Create string for schema-URL

vegawidget

Create a Vega/Vega-Lite htmlwidget

vega_embed

Vega embed options

vw_set_base_url

Set base URL

knit_print.vegaspec

Knit-print method

vw_as_json

Coerce vegaspec to JSON

image

Create or write image

vegawidgetOutput

Shiny-output for vegawidget

renderVegawidget

Render shiny-output for vegawidget

Developed by Ian J Lyttle.

Site built with pkgdown 1.6.1.
